founders.name: Tavo Zambrano, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CEO @SkydropX  (YCombinator S18)  Logistic Management System for E-commerce & Retail in Mexico. We have raised +$7M USD from investors like Y Combinator, Sierra Ventures, FJ Labs, Variv Capital, Dynamo and more.

Before Founder/CEO of ordering online platform sold to Delivery Hero in 2014. Three countries, 30 employees. Raised $1M USD. 500 Startups MV (Batch 6).

generated_description:
### SkydropX: Streamlining E-Commerce Logistics in Mexico

**Overview:**
Founded in 2015 and currently located in Monterrey, Mexico, SkydropX is an innovative player in the logistics sector, focused on creating a comprehensive logistics management system for e-commerce and retail businesses throughout Mexico. The company has grown its team to 320 employees and is a proud member of the Y Combinator Batch S18. Michael Seibel serves as their group partner.

**Mission:**
SkydropX aims to automate the shipping process for businesses, making logistics seamless. Their flagship feature, “AI Dispatch,” enables companies to easily select, purchase, and print shipping labels, track shipments, estimate delivery times, and manage returns. They strive to provide businesses with complete control over their shipping experience, from cart to door.

**Key Offerings:**
Their platform features a suite of tools to enhance shipping efficiency:
- **Shipping Automation**: Connect platforms and manage shipping directly.
- **Dynamic Pricing Calculator**: Calculate costs effectively, taking into account weight and delivery zones.
- **Batch Shipment Generation**: Sync orders and generate shipping guides in bulk.
- **Centralized Support**: Resolve shipping inquiries from a single platform.
- **Protection Plans**: Ensure packages are sent securely.

Additionally, SkydropX offers robust tracking features, including automated notifications and a personalized tracking page for customers, which are designed to improve customer experience post-purchase.

**Achievements:**
SkydropX has efficiently managed over 3 million shipments monthly, supporting around 100,000 companies. They are noted for drastically reducing logistics costs—up to 70%—and increasing revenue potential by up to three times through real-time shipping options and effective pricing strategies. Their exceptional customer service has earned them recognition from Zendesk, further solidifying their position as a top logistics software provider in Mexico.

**Funding and Recognition:**
Recently, SkydropX raised $20 million in Series A funding from investors including 645 Ventures and Base 10. They have also received accolades, such as being featured in Forbes as one of Mexico's top startups to watch.

**Website:**
To discover more about their offerings and how they can help optimize your logistics process, visit [SkydropX](http://skydropx.com).

In a nutshell, SkydropX is reshaping how businesses approach logistics in Mexico, combining technology and customer-centric solutions to transform the e-commerce shipping experience. If you're in retail or e-commerce, their platform could very well be the key to simplifying your operations and delighting your customers.
